item.name: read_out_protection
item.caption: Read Out Protection
item.descript: Read protection option byte. The read protection is used to protect the software code stored in Flash memory

item.name: rdp
item.caption: RDP
item.descript: Level 0: no protection\nLevel 1: read protection of memories\nLevel 2: chip protection

item.name: nRST_DSM
item.caption: nRST_DSM
item.descript: Enable :Reset generated when entering Deep Sleep mode\nDisable:No reset generated

item.name: nRST_PWD
item.caption: nRST_PWD
item.descript: Enable :Reset generated when entering Power-Down mode\nDisable:No reset generated

item.name: nBOOT
item.caption: nBOOT
item.descript: nBOOT1:nBOOT0=00 Start from Flash\nnBOOT1:nBOOT0=01 Start from SRAM\nnBOOT1:nBOOT0=11 Start from System

item.name: High Inner CLock
item.caption: RAM_PARITY
item.descript: High Inner CLock select

item.name: Page0-Page3
item.caption: Page0-Page3
item.descript: Enable :Write protection active on this sector\nDisable:Write protection not active on this sector

item.name: LVDSEL
item.caption: Low Voltage Detect
item.descript: Low voltage detect select

item.descript: Reset or Interrupt generated when Low voltage

item.name: LVDENB
item.caption: Low Voltage detection enable
item.descript: Enable or Disable Low Voltage detection
